data.oai_dc:dc: Data for ARTs and lifetime reproductive success in male CGS

Male Columbian ground squirrels (Urocitellus columbianus) data collected in the field located in Kananaskis Country, Alberta, Canada. Two separate data sets were used for the different analyses. Data for the direct comparison between satellite and territorial males is in the tab labeled "Direct_Comparison". The data for the lifetime reproductive success analysis is in the tab labeled "Lifetime_Reproductive_Success".
Columbian ground squirrel|alternative reproductive tactics|mating tactic|life history pathways|lifetime reproductive success|territorial
